full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLO BUR RKYEN BZLOG SER BU'I SGRA DBYANGS KYI MCHOD SBYIN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES BRJOD CING THAL MO BRDAB, BLUD RDZAS SOGS MA LUS PA GNOD PA'I PHYOGS SU BSKYAL, ,BZLOG PA'I  'TSAMS BCOD BYED CING, ,RJES CHOG DKYUS BZHIN BYED, ,THABS DANG @004B RTEN 'BREL LA BRTEN PA'I, ,BLO BUR RKYEN BZLOG BLUD SBYIN 'DI, K'OO SHR'I BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL DANG, RANG GI NYE 'KHO SLOB SU NI, BLO LDAN RIG GROL LA SOGS PA'I, ,BSKUL PHYIR 'DOD LTAR CHOS RJE YI, ,THA SHAL SKAL BZANG MING CAN GYIS, ,SNGON MED SER BU'I SGRA DBYANGS KYI, ,LEGS BSHAD BCOL CHUNG 'DI SGRAGS PA'I, ,DGE BAS MA GYUR SEMS CAN RNAMS, ,GLO BUR RKYEN DANG BRAL GYUR CIG , ,,'DI LA MKHAS RNAMS THUGS MA 'KHREL, ,BKRA SHIS DPAL BAR BRGYAN DU BYON, ,'PHRAL DU BGYIS PA'I YI GE PA NI AER KHE PI LIG THU YE SHES BLO LDAN NO, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
